冰岛语(Icelandic)属于印欧语系,日耳曼语族,被日耳曼语支,使用拉丁字母书写,是北欧福利国家冰岛的官方语言。冰岛语母语人口只有32万,是名符其实的小语种。美言翻译.

entry.def: Something that is Icelandic belongs or relates to Iceland, to its people, or to its language.
Icelandic is the official language of Iceland.

means.word_mean: 1. a Scandinavian language that is the official language of Iceland
1. of or relating to Iceland or its people or culture;
